name: Avocado Love
description:
Avocado Love is a colorful and enjoyable platformer with a side view.

Pirates have kidnapped the soul mate of our hero Avocado, help him save her and reunite again.

Our hero is ready for anything for the sake of love, he will pass any tests and solve any puzzles. He can cling to walls in certain places, press buttons, move boxes, throw a box on the heads of enemies, which leads to their instant neutralization. Also in the game there are puzzle elements, from the banal to find the key, to more difficult moments!

The game is suitable for children, but adults will also appreciate it!

-nice bright graphics
- sweet music
-gamepad support
